Posted By: Westin (7/20/2009 12:05:29 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Just when I decide to start playing Magic again, **\*YOU\*** of all cards return. The bane of my days as a newbie, the *horror* of my time as a starter, and the single most annoying card I can think right off the bat (well good'ol lightning ball also returned... *\*\*\**). However I find this irony refreshing, we'll see how both of us adapt to the new rules.  
  
Enough with my whining, back with a worthwhile comment: Lightning is an excellent card for aggro themed deck. Will give a quick advantage against pretty much all decks without creatures that have only (1) mana summoning cost, plus using a counter spell might not be the best idea (might want to save it for an emergency). I also love the flavor text; it is deliciously ironic and incredibly adequate. This card definitely deserves a 4/5 for being an excellent game opener and for sheer nostalgia overflow.
posts.html:

The bane of my days as a newbie, the horror of my time as a starter, and the single most annoying card I can think right off the bat (well good'ol lightning ball also returned... ***). However I find this irony refreshing, we'll see how both of us adapt to the new rules.

Enough with my whining, back with a worthwhile comment: Lightning is an excellent card for aggro themed deck. Will give a quick advantage against pretty much all decks without creatures that have only (1) mana summoning cost, plus using a counter spell might not be the best idea (might want to save it for an emergency). I also love the flavor text; it is deliciously ironic and incredibly adequate. This card definitely deserves a 4/5 for being an excellent game opener and for sheer nostalgia overflow.
